Github

Open Source Vanilla Javascript Libraries for Building Touchpoints as a System.

CustumerJourney.js is an open-source project that thrives on community support. By sponsoring us on GitHub, you help us maintain and improve the library, ensuring it remains a valuable resource for developers worldwide.

Visit our Sponsor Page to learn more about how you can contribute and support the project.

We appreciate your support and look forward to building a better CustumerJourney.js together!

Check out our GitHub repositories for code access:

  • cj-core
  • cj-components
  • cj-forms
  • cj-linkin-bio
  • cj-odoo
  • cj-router
  • cj-sliders
